title.value: Влияние интенсивности роста хряков белорусской мясной породы на параметры прогнозирования показателей воспроизводства
Influence of intensity of growth of male pigs of the Belarusian meaty breed on forecasting parameters of reproduction
Influence of intensity of growth of male pigs of the Belarusian meaty breed on forecasting parameters of reproduction

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Shatskij, M.A., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breeding (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented data on studying the influence of different intensity of growth of the boars of Belarusian meaty breed during the period of the increase on adequacy of the forecast of reproductive qualities. Researches were held in RUSP SGTS 'Zadneprovskij' in Vitebsk area on parameters of an estimation of own efficiency in elever conditions, reproductive qualities at station of artificial insemination. Parameters of growth and development of male pigs for two adjacent years have served as work initial material. To the genetic analysis have been subjected 28 male pigs of the Belarus meat breed, estimated on own efficiency in elever conditions. The animals with moderate intensity of growth difference more high twin and plural factors of correlation between reproduction indicators, on which the parameters of forecast equations were less from actual parameters on 0,02-0,06%.
